item.title: 中国太阳能进军中东应引起华盛顿的质疑
item.description:
世界两大经济体之间的清洁能源之争可能会产生一组意想不到的赢家— 海湾国家。【原文：

A clean-energy fight between the world’s two largest economies may have created an unexpected set of winners —  the Gulf states.

item.title: 亚马逊不断膨胀的现金堆为分红创造了条件
item.description: 亚马逊公司今年的现金囤积预计将超过 1000 亿美元，这对于亚马逊公司与其他巨型公司一起向股东返还现金，包括可能打破股息封印来说，是前所未有的有利条件。【原文：With a cash hoard that’s expected to top $100 billion this year, conditions have never been more favorable for Amazon.com Inc. join its megacap peers in returning cash to shareholders, including by potentially breaking the seal on a dividend.】

item.title: 通胀加速，乌克兰结束连续降息
item.description: 乌克兰停止了连续三次降息，因为通胀加速促使政策制定者发出了明年才可能恢复宽松政策的信号。【原文：Ukraine halted a run of three interest-rate cuts as an acceleration in inflation prompted policymakers to signal that easing may only be resumed next year.】

item.title: 美国公司在中国受到热烈欢迎，但不确定是否被需要
item.description: 本周访华的美国高管有机会与习近平主席的政府高级官员会面，但在中国政府对外国投资的开放态度上，他们收到了相互矛盾的信号。【原文：US executives who visited China this week got the chance to meet with senior officials of President Xi Jinping’s government, but received conflicting signals over Beijing’s openness to foreign investment.】

item.title: 阿达尼旗下电力公司计划出售 5.97 亿美元股票
item.description: 高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）的输电部门正在考虑通过出售股票筹集至少 500 亿卢比（约合 5.97 亿美元）的资金，这也是这家印度企业集团自被做空者的一份严厉报告抹去数十亿股东价值后首次进军公开股票市场。【原文：Gautam Adani’s power transmission unit is considering raising at least 50 billion rupees ($597 million) through a share sale, making the Indian conglomerate’s first foray into public equity markets since a scathing short-seller’s report wiped away billions in shareholder value.】

item.title: 迈克尔-诺沃格拉茨的银河公司为新的加密风险基金融资 1.13 亿美元
item.description: 亿万富翁迈克尔-诺沃格拉茨（Michael Novogratz）的银河资产管理公司（Galaxy Asset Management）为一支风险基金筹集了 1.13 亿美元，该基金主要投资于加密软件、基础设施和金融应用领域的早期初创企业。【原文：Billionaire Michael Novogratz’s Galaxy Asset Management unit has raised $113 million for a venture fund investing in early-stage startups focused on crypto software, infrastructure and financial applications.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。全球股市下跌步伐加快，令人失望的财报火上浇油，投资者纷纷涌向避风港。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. The global selloff in stocks gathers pace, disappointing earnings add fuel to the fire and investors rush to havens. Here’s what’s moving markets. — David Goodman】

item.title: J.波兰消费者失踪，马丁斯跌幅创 2008 年以来最大
item.description: 波兰最大的食品杂货连锁店 Jeronimo Martins SGPS SA 的同店销售额出现了五年来的首次下滑，使人们对消费需求回升的预期落空，该公司的跌幅也创下了 2008 年以来的最大值。【原文：Jeronimo Martins SGPS SA tumbled by the most since 2008 after the owner of Poland’s biggest grocery chain reported the first decline in same-store sales in five years, dashing bets on a rebound of consumer demand.】

item.title: 新兴市场股市触及五周低点，中国举措未见成效
item.description: 新兴市场股市跌至五周以来的最低点，原因是中国本周采取的第二次货币宽松举措未能缓解市场对该国经济放缓的担忧，同时人工智能类股票的抛售也在加深。【原文：Emerging-market stocks slumped to the lowest in five weeks as China’s second monetary-easing move this week failed to soothe concern about the country’s economic slowdown just as a selloff in artificial-intelligence stocks deepened.】

item.title: 海湾地区股市上半年暴跌后迎来夏季缓和期
item.description: 海湾地区的股票在经历了 2024 年上半年的暴跌后，在夏季出现反弹，原因是乐观的盈利报告和更低的估值吸引了买家。【原文：Stocks in the Gulf region are rebounding in the summer after slumping in the first half of 2024 as upbeat earnings reports and cheaper valuations entice buyers.】

item.title: 特朗普希望美元走软，但华尔街怀疑他能否如愿
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普想做一个弱美元总统。但他的竞选纲领是强势美元。【原文：Donald Trump wants to be a weak-dollar president. But he’s running on a strong-dollar platform.】

item.title: 中国公布 410 亿美元促进消费计划的价格标签
item.description: 中国首次披露，它将拨出 3,000 亿元人民币（合 410 亿美元）的专项资金，用于对全国的工业和家用设备库存进行改造。【原文：China disclosed for the first time it’s earmarking 300 billion yuan ($41 billion) for an initiative to give a makeover to the country’s stock of industrial and household equipment.】

item.title: 保时捷与债权人 BlueBay 和 Hayfin 就 Varta 交易进行谈判
item.description: Varta AG 的债权人（包括 RBC BlueBay Asset Management）正在与保时捷公司（Porsche AG）谈判，希望联手为这家陷入困境的电池制造商达成重组协议。【原文：Varta AG’s creditors including RBC BlueBay Asset Management are in talks with Porsche AG to join forces on a restructuring deal for the embattled battery maker.】

item.title: RRJ 与 MBK 就渤海租赁 20 亿美元债务再融资进行谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，随着 RRJ Capital、MBK Partners Ltd. 和其他融资方寻求提供新资金，渤海租赁有限公司距离价值 20 亿美元的债务再融资又近了一步。【原文：Bohai Leasing Co. is one step closer to refinancing debt worth $2 billion as RRJ Capital, MBK Partners Ltd. and other financiers look to provide new funds, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印尼称波音公司高管和诺贝尔奖得主持有黄金签证
item.description: 印尼最高移民官员表示，波音公司的一名高级官员和一名诺贝尔奖获得者是印尼黄金签证的早期持有者，自该计划推出近一年以来，已吸引了 300 名申请人。【原文：A senior official of Boeing Co. and a Nobel laureate are among the early holders of Indonesian golden visas, which have attracted 300 applicants since the program’s launch almost a year ago, the nation’s top immigration official said.】

item.title: 宝钢对沙特钢铁合资企业的投资翻番至 10 亿美元
item.description: 中国最大的钢铁生产商宝山钢铁股份有限公司（Baoshan Iron & Steel Co.【原文：Baoshan Iron & Steel Co., China’s biggest steel producer, said it more than doubled its investment in a steel plate venture in Saudi Arabia to $1 billion.】

item.title: 欧洲最大制药商因新产品需求上调业绩预期
item.description: 欧洲大型制药商提高了财务指导，因为对创新药物的关注有助于刺激销售。【原文：Big European drugmakers lifted their financial guidance as a focus on new, innovative drugs helped stimulate sales.】

item.title: 摩尔多瓦财政部长辞去央行职务
item.description: 在这个东欧国家寻求加强关键机构之际，摩尔多瓦财政部长辞去了政府职务，在中央银行担任高级职务。【原文：Moldova’s finance minister resigned from the government to take a senior position in the central bank as the eastern European nation seeks to strengthen key institutions.】

item.title: 英国最大投资者 LGIM 因拜登退出而放弃特朗普交易
item.description: 法律与amp; 通用投资管理公司（Legal & General Investment Management）放弃了对国债曲线将陡峭化的押注，称乔-拜登总统退出美国大选减少了共和党大获全胜的机会。【原文：Legal & General Investment Management is bailing on a bet that the Treasury curve will steepen, saying President Joe Biden’s exit from the US election race reduces the chance of a Republican clean sweep.】

item.title: 避险需求增加，美国国债引领全球债券反弹
item.description: 由于经济放缓的迹象和近期股市的溃败助长了美联储加快降息的呼声，美国债券大幅反弹。【原文：US bonds rallied sharply as signs of a slowing economy and a recent stock-market rout fueled calls for quicker interest-rate cuts from the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 日元突然上涨引发市场 "大范围清算
item.description: 随着投资者重新评估他们的杠杆押注，日元的惊人反弹正在颠覆全球市场，拖累人民币走高，并打击了从日本股票到黄金和比特币等资产。【原文：The yen’s stunning revival is upending global markets, dragging the yuan higher alongside it and hammering assets from Japanese stocks to gold and Bitcoin as investors reassess their leveraged bets.】

item.title: 存款减少，印度银行出售零售贷款组合
item.description: 印度私营银行正在出售零售贷款组合，因为监管机构要求它们提高信贷存款比率。【原文：India’s private banks are selling portfolios of retail loans as regulators pressure them to improve credit-deposit ratios.】

item.title: 德国企业预期下降，加深反弹担忧
item.description: 德国商业前景意外下滑，加剧了人们对欧洲最大经济体反弹的担忧。【原文：Germany’s business outlook unexpectedly fell, adding to concerns over the rebound of Europe’s biggest economy.】

item.title: 中国法院审议江苏德隆债权人的重组申请
item.description: 全球最大的不锈钢生产商之一江苏德龙镍业股份有限公司的一名债权人向中国法院表示，这家由传奇商人戴国芳及其家族控制的企业需要重组。【原文：A creditor of Jiangsu Delong Nickel Industry Co., one of the world’s largest stainless steel producers, has told a Chinese court the business controlled by legendary businessman Dai Guofang and his family needs to be restructured.】

item.title: 订阅增长未达预期，环球公司下挫 30
item.description: 环球音乐集团（Universal Music Group NV）的订阅和流媒体收入增长令投资者失望，该公司股价下跌高达 30%，创下首次公开募股以来的最大跌幅。【原文：Universal Music Group NV’s shares fell as much as 30%, the biggest decline since the company’s initial public offering, after its subscription and streaming revenue growth disappointed investors.】

item.title: 老挝考虑与中国进行债转股以避免违约
item.description: 老挝央行行长表示，老挝的债务已超过其偿还能力，为避免最终出现违约，老挝可能会探索与其最大的债权国中国进行债转股。【原文：Laos, which has racked up more debt than it can repay, could explore swapping debt for equity with its biggest creditor China to avoid an eventual default, the Southeast Asian nation’s central bank chief said.】

item.title: 巴厘岛计划 200 亿美元铁路项目缓解道路拥堵
item.description: 巴厘岛计划耗资 200 亿美元开始建设连接机场和旅游区的铁路网，以缓解交通拥堵。【原文：Bali plans to start building a $20 billion railway network connecting the airport with tourist areas in a bid to reduce traffic congestion.】

item.title: 政策收紧，尼日利亚以创纪录的高收益率拍卖国债
item.description: 尼日利亚国库券周三以创纪录的高收益率进行拍卖，此前一天，尼日利亚央行再次提高利率，以应对通货膨胀并支持该国货币。【原文：Nigerian Treasury bills were auctioned at a record high yield on Wednesday, a day after the central bank raised interest rates again in a bid to tackle inflation and support the nation’s currency.】

item.title: 法国 CAC 40 指数从 5 月高点下跌 10%，将进入调整期
item.description: 由于开云集团（Kering SA）等重量级企业的盈利令人失望，加上政治动荡令投资者对国家财政状况忧心忡忡，法国股市即将从 5 月份创下的纪录回调 10%。【原文：French stocks are on the verge of a 10% correction from their May record, weighed down by disappointing earnings from heavyweights such as Kering SA as well as political turmoil that has investors fretting about the state of the nation’s finances.】
